cs.IT, cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CR 

The paper deals with the construction of codes for rank modulation, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). It also involves the use of permutations and distance measures, which are common in discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also mentions the use of recursive methods and direct constructions, which are relevant to algorithms and complexity (cs.CC). Finally, the paper discusses the detection of errors, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR).
